title: Bug 14368Create getter and setter insert code into readonly file
description: Bug 14368Create getter and setter insert code into readonly file 1. Reopen it and you should not be able to modify anything4. The class becomespackage jp1;public class C {private int id;/Gets the id. @return Returns a int /public int getId() {return id;}/Sets the id. @param id The id to set /public void setId(int id) {this.id = id;}}and the editor is dirty, but you cannot save it until clear the readonlyflag.
SR: Create a class C as follow:package jp1;public class C {private int id;}2. Close it and mark it as read only3. From the outline view, select "idint" and right mouse click andselect "Create getter and setter".5.
